title: New: Coma Cinema – White Trash VHS (Drunk Version)
body:
**NB: Not actual artwork**

**Coma Cinema’s** fourth LP entitled _**School Shootings**_ is far and away my most anticipated release of 2012.

Last year’s **_Blue Suicide_** quite rightly cemented **Mat Cothran’s** position as one of the finest songwriters around, and quite how he isn’t being hounded by industry A&R’s I’ll never know. This new demo taken from said forthcoming album is described as **Cothran** as being _‘about the time I was almost murdered and every thing that happened because of that’._ Record whilst in a state of intoxication, it’s everything we’ve grown to love from **Coma Cinema**; raw, emotional and scarily real. Check out _White Trash VHS_ below and the tracklisting for _**School Shootings**_ under that.

*   White Trash VHS
*   School Shootings
*   Warm Wolves Milking Mary
*   Survivor’s Guilt
*   Partners In Crime
*   Virgin Veins
*   Leaking House
*   Hurt Everything
*   Hotter Sadness
*   Lee
*   Columbine High Harmony
